logText: Bed 237 in the emergency department is waiting for release.
The maternity department has a medium load, it is recommended to prepare for a heavy load in the next day.
Bed 257, children's department, exceeds the time estimated by the doctor's recommendation by 13 hours.
Bed 278 in the emergency department exceeds the defined treatment time. It is recommended to be transferred to the internal departments for further appropriate treatment.
The emergency department is at maximum load. Please refer patients to other hospitals or transfer beds from the following departments: Internal A, Internal B, Children.
In the children's ward, there are 10 beds waiting to be released - please contact the doctor in the ward to release them.
In the children's ward, there are 10 beds waiting to be released - please contact the doctor in the ward to release them.
